element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithms clips a vector layer using a rectangular area defined by its max and min coordinates. Instead of using a second layer to define the clipping region, this is defined numerically by the user. Useful in scripting and batch mode.

element.name: XMIN
element.text: Minimum X coordinate of the clipping region

element.name: XMAX
element.text: Maximum X coordinate of the clipping region

element.name: YMIN
element.text: Minimum Y coordinate of the clipping region

element.name: YMAX
element.text: Maximum Y coordinate of the clipping region

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The clipped layer, which will contain geometries only within the defined boundary rectangle
